content:
At its Peek Performance event today, Apple unveiled the latest iPad Air along with the new iPhone SE 3. The new iPad Air 5 (2022) features the same design as the iPad Air 4 from 2020, however, it packs significant hardware improvements, including a new chipset and 5G support. description: You can pre-order the new iPad Air 5 (2022) already, and we have a guide on how to do so and for how much it will cost. Check it out!
